caseTitle: Parvez Elahi (Presently Confined in Adiala Jail) through its attorney, Qaisra Elahi v. Election Commission of Pakistan through its Secretary, Lahore Punjab and others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: At the heart of a thriving democracy lies the fundamental process of elections, an embodiment of the democratic principle that power should be vested in the hands of the people. And at its core, democracy is all about participation. The disenfranchisement by rejection of nomination papers on trivial grounds must be avoided.
